oldentry: Popular explanation: vomit coming out of your mouth.
verblex: 1. Of food and drink, to come back up from your stomach and out through your mouth, usually because you are ill. English = vomit, (be) sick. Idiomatic English = throw up.
nomlex: 1. Partly digested food and drink that has come back up from someone's stomach and out through their mouth. English = vomit, sick.
